reviewText: If you've never used Adobe After Effects before, This DVD is great for beginners. Easy to follow & very helpful. Well worth the [...]

This DVD is exactly what it says it is, a "getting started" guide for Adobe After Effects CS3. While not a true tutorial showing the full fuctionality of AE (it would have to be a multi-disk set to even scratch the surface), the presenter does a good job showing the interface, workflow, and basic functionality.

For beginers, and at this price, this is a great product!

Recommended!
This product came pretty fast and was in very good condition. I am very happy about this service!
